ExploreFact.Text: There was a new Nomai Recording by Slate. It is apparently the start of a scavenger hunt! The first clue is "Beneath cracking crust, An arrival's depiction, Sets all in motion"

RumorFact.Text: "With the rock that moves, by water and trees, in the quiet grove, enjoy a gentle breeze"

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai recording in the Quantam Grove on Timber Hearth. It gave me another hint. "With a view of the wilds, the final clue does hide, sheltered from the hungry void, safe on the other side"
